parts.text: {"word":"membangun","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"mendirikan (bangunan dsb); membuat (jalan, jembatan, dsb)","english_definition":"to build; to construct; to establish; to develop","examples":[{"sentence":"Pemerintah sedang membangun jalan tol baru.","translation":"The government is building a new toll road.","english_translation":"The government is building a new toll road."},{"sentence":"Mereka membangun rumah di atas bukit.","translation":"They are building a house on the hill.","english_translation":"They are building a house on the hill."},{"sentence":"Kita harus membangun hubungan yang baik dengan tetangga.","translation":"We must build good relationships with our neighbors.","english_translation":"We must build good relationships with our neighbors."}],"collocations":["membangun rumah (build a house)","membangun jembatan (build a bridge)","membangun hubungan (build a relationship)","membangun reputasi (build a reputation)","membangun ekonomi (develop the economy)"],"synonyms":["mendirikan","membuat","menegakkan","mengembangkan","menciptakan"],"antonyms":["merusak","menghancurkan","membongkar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"mengembangkan (potensi, kemampuan, dsb); membentuk (karakter, kepribadian, dsb)","english_definition":"to develop; to cultivate; to form","examples":[{"sentence":"Pendidikan membantu membangun karakter anak.","translation":"Education helps to build a child's character.","english_translation":"Education helps to build a child's character."},{"sentence":"Kita perlu membangun potensi diri.","translation":"We need to develop our potential.","english_translation":"We need to develop our potential."},{"sentence":"Pengalaman membangun kepercayaan diri.","translation":"Experience builds confidence.","english_translation":"Experience builds confidence."}],"collocations":["membangun potensi (develop potential)","membangun karakter (build character)","membangun kepercayaan diri (build confidence)","membangun keterampilan (develop skills)"],"synonyms":["mengembangkan","membentuk","meningkatkan","memperkuat"],"antonyms":["menurunkan","melemahkan"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","intransitive","definition":"berkembang; maju","english_definition":"to develop; to progress","examples":[{"sentence":"Kota ini semakin membangun dengan pesat.","translation":"This city is developing rapidly.","english_translation":"This city is developing rapidly."},{"sentence":"Usahanya semakin membangun.","translation":"His business is progressing.","english_translation":"His business is progressing."}],"collocations":["membangun dengan pesat (develop rapidly)","membangun secara berkelanjutan (develop sustainably)"],"synonyms":["berkembang","maju","meningkat"],"antonyms":["mundur","merosot"]}],"etymology":{"value":"From the root word 'bangun' which means 'to wake up' or 'to rise'. The prefix 'mem-' indicates an active transitive verb. Therefore, 'membangun' literally means 'to make something rise' or 'to bring something into being'.","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/məm.ˈba.ŋʊn/","syllables":"mem-ba-ngun"},"inflection":{"notes":"This is an active transitive verb. It can be inflected with prefixes and suffixes to change its meaning and grammatical function. For example, 'dibangun' (passive voice), 'pembangun' (noun - builder), 'pembangunan' (noun - development/construction)."},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Membangun' is a versatile word that can refer to physical construction, development of abstract qualities, or the progress of something. The context will usually make the meaning clear. It's important to note the difference between 'membangun' (active, transitive) and 'dibangun' (passive).","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Saya membangun untuk rumah.","correct":"Saya membangun rumah.","note":"The preposition 'untuk' is not needed after 'membangun' when it directly precedes the object (rumah)."},{"incorrect":"Dia sedang membangunkan rumah.","correct":"Dia sedang membangun rumah.","note":"'Membangunkan' means 'to wake someone up'. 'Membangun' is the correct word for 'building' a house."}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["bangun (to wake up, to rise)","bangunan (building, structure)","pembangun (builder)","pembangunan (development, construction)","dibangun (built - passive voice)","terbangun (accidentally built, woken up)"],"phrasal_verbs":["membangun kembali (to rebuild)","membangun dari awal (to build from scratch)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"frequency_google_ngram":"High frequency in Indonesian texts.","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"Intermediate","text":"'Membangun' is a common word used in various contexts related to construction, development, and building relationships. It's important to understand the context to determine the exact meaning. Pay attention to the object of the verb to understand whether it refers to a physical structure, abstract quality, or process.","priority":"★★☆"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Perusahaan itu membangun pabrik baru di kawasan industri.","translation":"That company is building a new factory in the industrial area.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"construction"},{"sentence":"Kita harus membangun rasa percaya di antara anggota tim.","translation":"We must build trust among team members.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"developing relationships"},{"sentence":"Pemerintah berupaya membangun ekonomi yang berkelanjutan.","translation":"The government is trying to build a sustainable economy.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"economic development"},{"sentence":"Dia membangun kariernya dari nol.","translation":"He built his career from scratch.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"career development"},{"sentence":"Desa ini sedang membangun infrastruktur yang lebih baik.","translation":"This village is building better infrastructure.","type":"verb","meaning_category":"infrastructure development"}]}
